english.segment2: We walk on this narrow road. Now restored as one we walk. In Your hope. And though. Darkness fills our path. Fear won't fix its hold on us. For we know
english.segment4: Love will shine before us on our path. And guide our every step within the dark
english.segment6: We bear tidings of Your hope. Freedom from the sinner's plight. Through Your love. Our eyes set upon this task. Truth in hand as one we walk. We advance
english.segment8: Love will shine before us on our path. To guide our every step within the dark. To know You is our only cry. Knowing You our only cry. Knowing You our only cry
english.segment10: Lord here we are with humbled hearts. To see your will be done. Let love shape us to Your own design. To bear our Maker's sign
english.segment12: Love will shine before us on our path. To guide our every step within the dark. To know You is our only cry. Knowing You our only cry. Knowing You our only cry
